Here's what others have to say about us.

  • Ravihara Weerathunge

    Local Guide

    It was a 2 night stay, and the place is decent. Clean room, bathroom, and dining area. Wish we had hot bathing water, though. The owner is very polite and ateded to our matters promptly. Highly recommend if you are Ok with cold water for a night time bath. Nearby activities: Nonpareil mountain hike, Belihul oya, and much more.

  • Anna

    Foreign Visitor from Russia

    Great location close to many different hiking trails. You can get a bus easily to and from the property. There is hot water with good pressure. Comfortable mattress. Kitchen equipment, such as electrical kettle and rice cooker. The owner was very helpful and was at our disposal at any time

  • Thomas

    Foreign Visitor from UK

    We stayed here for one night we enjoyed it so much we extended for another night. The host is a very sweet & warm person. He is an interesting man and keeps his home and the guest apartments very clean so much so I was impressed at how neat and well thought out the spaces were. They smelled very fresh as did the bed linens and towels 🙂 We stayed in the budget room equipped with two huge beds, fluffy pillows a fan, great shower with hot water & huge kitchen with a fridge. This was so needed and appreciated after spending the whole day exploring waterfalls and trekking through the stunning scenery that surrounds this homestay. The host has a beautiful garden with tropical flowers and spaces for guests to sit and enjoy the garden also you can enjoy the many authentic & delicious breakfast, lunches & dinners the host will provide at a very reasonable cost. He truly takes the hassle out of everything for you and will go miles out of his way for you. We felt very safe and extremely cared for here. There are gates with locks on for your scooter and your own private access to the building. This homestay is in one of the most beautiful and historical regions in Sri Lanka. Stay here and you will not be disappointed. Istouti for a fabulous experience ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

The serene surroundings added to the charm, creating a perfect retreat for couples. The hospitality was outstanding, and we highly recommend Cottage Home for a delightful and affordable getaway.

Popular places near By

Bamabarakanda Waterfall

Babarakanda falls is situated in Kalupahana.It can be found in a forest of pine trees.Traveling to this place is not easy as to the other falls of Sri Lanka.

Pahanthudawa Waterfall

Beautiful waterfall and small. Visit there with family and young kids. It is a risk that visit this place with young kids.

Baker's Bend

Bakers bend,One of the scenic place in Sri lanka, is a viewpoint located at the 23rd bend of the Nonpareil estate road leading from Belihuloya to Nagrak Banglow.

Wangedigala Mountain

Wangedigala is a popular hiking spot situated in a village named Kalupahana.Mountain peak represents the shape of a pestle

Samanalawewa Reserviour

Samanalawewa Dam is a dam which is situated near Balangoda town in the Sabaragamuwa Province.Commissioned in the year 1992.

Surathaliella Waterfall

Surathali Ella waterfall is situated in Walhaputenna in the Ratnapura district. It is 60 meters high, 2 meters wide and is made up of 3 segments.
